arts.ttl: James Penrice believes Hearts title hype as he gives AEK Athens inside scoop on Aberdeen
arts.sum: The defender believes the Jambos are in with a real shout of making their title dream a reality

arts.ttl: AEK Athens vs Aberdeen predictions: Dons can keep their marbles in Greece
arts.sum: The feelgood factor is back at Pittodrie and Steve Davies sees no reason why Aberdeen cannot push AEK Athens all the way in their second UEFA Conference League group game.
